description: Lists the pricing rules that are associated with a pricing plan.

parameters.name: PricingPlanArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan for which associations are to be listed.

nested_items.name: BillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The billing period for which the pricing rule associations are listed.

nested_items.name: PricingPlanArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan for which associations are listed.

nested_items.name: PricingRuleArns
nested_items.description: A list containing pricing rules that are associated with the requested pricing plan.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to be used on subsequent calls.
